00029 /// GenericClient class.
00030 /// This class provides members and methods that make it easier to write simple
00031 /// client applications.
00032 /// @class GenericClient
00033 typedef struct GenericClient
00034 {
00035    ushort state;     ///< tells if the client is connected to the server
00036    ushort command;   ///< the command the client is running / will run
00037    ushort event;     ///< event that will be passed to the application code
00038    int error;        ///< error generated by the execution of the last command
00039    ushort errorType; ///< type of the last error
00040    Message* message; ///< communications buffer
00041    char* operation;  ///< last operation performed / being performed
00042    bool shouldRetryConnect; ///< keeps trying to connect, don't return error
00043 } GenericClient;
00044 
00045 /// The unique GenericClient instance used by the library.
00046 static GenericClient genCli;
00047 
00048 /// Configuration flag: keep retrying when connect fails
00049 /// @private @memberof GenericClient
00050 
00051 /// States of the generic client.
00052 /// @private @memberof GenericClient
00053 enum GenericClientState
00054 {
00055    CLI_ST_NOT_CONNECTED  ,
00056    CLI_ST_CONNECTED_IDLE ,
00057 };
00058 
00059 /// Commands for the generic client.
00060 /// @private @memberof GenericClient
00061 enum GenericClientCommand
00062 {
00063    CLI_CMD_CLOSE    ,
00064    CLI_CMD_CONNECT  ,
00065    CLI_CMD_RECV     ,
00066    CLI_CMD_SEND     ,
00067 };
00068

00075 static void runConnect(void);
00076 static void runConnectedIdle(void);
00077 static void runNotConnected(void);

00079 static void runSendMessage(void);

00087 
00088     @memberof GenericClient
00089 */
00090 
00091 TC2API void genCli_close(void)
00092 {
00093    genCli.operation = "CLOSE";
00094    genCli.command = CLI_CMD_CLOSE;
00095 }

00158 /** initializes the generic client.
00159 
00160     Performs the client library initialization, creates the generic client's
00161       working message
00162 
00163     @memberof GenericClient
00164 */
00165 
00166 TC2API void genCli_init(void)
00167 {
00168    client_init();
00169 
00170    client_createClientSocket();
00171 
00172    genCli.message = message_create(0);
00173 
00174    genCli.state = CLI_ST_NOT_CONNECTED;
00175    genCli.command = CLI_CMD_CONNECT;
00176 }

00257 /** Runs the generic client application and returns an event to the appilcation.
00258 
00259     @return
00260     a pointer to a GenericClient instance.
00261 
00262     @memberof GenericClient
00263 */
00264 
00265 TC2API ushort genCli_waitEvent(void)
00266 {
00267    run();
00268    return genCli.event;
00269 }

00271 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00272 // INTERNAL HELPER FUNCTIONS
00273 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00274 
00275 /** Runs the generic client application.
00276 
00277     @private @memberof GenericClient
00278 */
00279 
00280 static void run(void)
00281 {
00282    switch (genCli.state)
00283    {
00284       case CLI_ST_NOT_CONNECTED:
00285          runNotConnected();
00286          break;
00287 
00288       case CLI_ST_CONNECTED_IDLE:
00289          runConnectedIdle();
00290          break;
00291 
00292       default: // ???
00293          abort();
00294          break;
00295    }
00296 }
00297 
00298 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00299 
00300 /** Runs the generic client application with command CLOSE.
00301 
00302     @private @memberof GenericClient
00303 */
00304 
00305 static void runClose(void)
00306 {
00307    client_closeConnection();
00308 
00309    genCli.state = CLI_ST_NOT_CONNECTED;
00310 
00311    genCli.event = CLI_EVT_CONNECTION_DESTROYED;
00312    genCli.error = 0;
00313    genCli.errorType = CLI_ERR_FORCED_CLOSE;
00314 }
00315 
00316 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00317 
00318 /** Runs the generic client application with command CONNECT.
00319 
00320     @private @memberof GenericClient
00321 */
00322 
00323 static void runConnect(void)
00324 {
00325    for (;;)
00326    {
00327       if (client_connect())
00328       {
00329          genCli.state = CLI_ST_CONNECTED_IDLE;
00330          genCli.event = CLI_EVT_CONNECTION_CREATED;
00331          return;
00332       }
00333 
00334       if (!genCli.shouldRetryConnect)
00335       {
00336          genCli.event = CLI_EVT_CONNECT_ERROR;
00337          return;
00338       }
00339 
00340       client_sleep(1); // try again, but sleep 1 second, to avoid spinning
00341    } // for
00342 }
00343 
00344 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00345 
00346 /** Runs the generic client application in the state CONNECTED_IDLE.
00347 
00348     @private @memberof GenericClient
00349 */
00350 
00351 static void runConnectedIdle(void)
00352 {
00353    switch (genCli.command)
00354    {
00355       case CLI_CMD_SEND:
00356          runSendMessage();
00357          break;
00358 
00359       case CLI_CMD_RECV:
00360          runRecvMessage();
00361          break;
00362 
00363       case CLI_CMD_CLOSE:
00364          runClose();
00365          break;
00366 
00367       default:
00368          genCli.event = CLI_EVT_INVALID_COMMAND;
00369          break;
00370    } // switch
00371 }
00372 
00373 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00374 
00375 /** Runs the generic client application in the state NOT_CONNECTED.
00376 
00377     @private @memberof GenericClient
00378 */
00379 
00380 static void runNotConnected(void)
00381 {
00382    if (genCli.command != CLI_CMD_CONNECT)
00383    {
00384       genCli.event = CLI_EVT_INVALID_COMMAND;
00385       return;
00386    }
00387 
00388    runConnect();
00389 }
00390 
00391 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00392 
00393 /** Runs the generic client application with command RECV.
00394 
00395     @private @memberof GenericClient
00396 */
00397 
00398 static void runRecvMessage(void)
00399 {
00400    if (client_recvMessage(genCli.message))
00401       genCli.event = CLI_EVT_RECV_COMPLETE;
00402 
00403    else if (client_timeout())
00404       genCli.event = CLI_EVT_RECV_TIMEOUT;
00405 
00406    else
00407    {
00408       // the connection has been closed
00409       genCli.state = CLI_ST_NOT_CONNECTED;
00410       genCli.event = CLI_EVT_CONNECTION_DESTROYED;
00411       genCli.error = client_error();
00412       genCli.errorType = client_errorType();
00413    }
00414 }
00415 
00416 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00417 
00418 /** Runs the generic client application with command SEND.
00419 
00420     @private @memberof GenericClient
00421 */
00422 
00423 static void runSendMessage(void)
00424 {
00425    if (client_sendMessage(genCli.message))
00426    {
00427       genCli.event = CLI_EVT_SEND_COMPLETE;
00428    }
00429    else
00430    {
00431       // the connection has been closed
00432       genCli.state = CLI_ST_NOT_CONNECTED;
00433       genCli.event = CLI_EVT_CONNECTION_DESTROYED;
00434       genCli.error = client_error();
00435       genCli.errorType = client_errorType();
00436    }
00437 }
